body_text:
Thanks for that explanation. I think I have a good handle of what's going on now. Who knew that randomized fields would be so complicated.
After all that, I think that setting the default in didMount, without preserving existing values (this.defaultIdenticon = generateRandomIcon()) would probably work well. It wouldn't affect recipes with existing identicons, and it would work even if component instances got re-used. (Is that a thing we need to worry about?)
That being said, I'm ok with any of the options we've gone through in this PR. If it fixes the clone bug, and doesn't flicker, I don't have any other concerns, and it seems like all of your solutions achieve that. I appreciate you working through it with me.
